name: Timothy KRAUS, Appellant, v. James E. TAYLOR and Harris Fuel, Appellees

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Timothy KRAUS, Appellant, v. James E. TAYLOR and Harris Fuel, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Samuel Merovitz, James L. Rosenbaum, Philadelphia, for Timothy Kraus.
Thomas P. Bracaglia, Philadelphia, for James Taylor and Harris Fuel.
casebody.head_matter:
743 A.2d 451
Timothy KRAUS, Appellant, v. James E. TAYLOR and Harris Fuel, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted July 28, 1999.
Decided Jan. 20, 2000.
Samuel Merovitz, James L. Rosenbaum, Philadelphia, for Timothy Kraus.
Thomas P. Bracaglia, Philadelphia, for James Taylor and Harris Fuel.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
